title: Bare Behind Bars - sexploitation women in prison movie
description:
Bare Behind Bars (released in Brazil as A PrisÃƒÂ£o, "The Prison") is a 1980 sexploitation film directed and written by Oswaldo de Oliveira and starring Maria Stella Splendore, Marta Anderson and Danielle Ferrite. Intended as a spoof of the common "women in prison" genre, it follows a sadistic female prison warden who sexually abuses the lesbian inmates, and features numerous gratuitous sex scenes between the prisoners and prison employees. The film was banned in the United Kingdom after independent film distributor Redemption_Films attempted to distribute the film in 1994, and X-rated in the United States due to its graphic depiction of coercive sex.

In a prison, women rebel against the guards' sadism and sexual abuse and decide to run away. Some manage to escape and are chased by the Police. 

It was released on DVD by Blue Underground on 30 May 2006.


Director: Oswaldo de Oliveira

Writer:Oswaldo de Oliveira

Stars:Maria Stella Splendore, Marta Anderson, Danielle Ferrite
